answers.answer: It depends.  Anybody would pee a lot if they drank a lot of water.  The question is, Are you constantly thirsty? If so, it could indicate an underlying problem.  Diabetes, for example. So if you are constantly drinking because you feel you need to, then it is time to see a doctor and find out what's wrong.

question: Everytime a drink water I urinate constantly is this a problem?
title: Urinating Constantly
